channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rising energy prices put AI and data centers in the crosshairs
item.description: A majority of consumers say they’re worried about data centers driving up electricity costs. Is the industry prepared for a possible backlash?

item.title: AI researchers ’embodied’ an LLM into a robot – and it started channeling Robin Williams
item.description: AI researchers at Andon Labs embedded various LLMs in a vacuum robot to test how ready they were to be embodied. And hilarity ensued.

item.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about AOL’s acquirer
item.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.

item.title: Elon Musk wants you to know that Sam Altman got a refund for his Tesla Roadster
item.description: Elon Musk and Sam Altman are still taking swipes at each other on Musk’s social media platform X.

item.title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong trolls the prediction markets
item.description: While Armstrong may have helped some Kalshi and Polymarket users make a little money, he was also illustrating how easily these markets can be manipul...

item.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about AOL’s acquirer
item.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.

item.title: AI mania tanks CoreWeave’s Core Scientific acquisition — it buys Python notebook Marimo
item.description: CoreWeave's failed buy of Core Scientific is another sign of an AI bubble. But it's still shopping.

item.title: Nancy Mace Curses, Berates Confused Cops in Airport Meltdown: Police Report
item.description: At an airport in South Carolina on Thursday, US representative Nancy Mace called police officers “fucking incompetent” and berated them repeatedly, ac...

item.title: Bluesky hits 40 million users, introduces ‘dislikes’ beta
item.description: As users "dislike" posts, the system will learn what sort of content they want to see less of. This will help to inform more than just how content is ...

item.title: Meta bought 1 GW of solar this week
item.description: The social media company inked three deals in the U.S. to power its data centers and offset its carbon footprint.
